function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Adverse effects of the covid-19 outbreak on the environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to outdoor spaces for residents in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and sunlight in enclosed balconies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural green spaces and amenities in the building’s surrounding environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination due to inefficient waste collection systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulation of viruses in buildings due to carpets and rugs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate building entrances contributing to pathogen transfer","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of isolation facilities for infected residents in housing buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of investment for virus and infectious disease detection systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of energy supply during a pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of touch-free technologies and digital controls in information transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-contamination risk due to inadequate hvac systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on energy consumption and investment costs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential limitations of proposed solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management and monitoring leading to the spread of infectious diseases through faecal-oral transmission, such
